author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

The algorithms of making HGCal geometry has been modified and it needs more input constants. The same algorithm is used in describing HFNose and needed updating

#### PR validation:

The changes are tested by re-running the workflow 26234.0 which was broken

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

If the HGCal code are back ported this change also needs back porting
title: Phase2-hcx191 Take care of hfnose in view of change in algorithm
